20101210020714.333|20101210020716.000|CCO|FAILED IN A BID TO REPEAL THE
20101210020716.000|20101210020717.667|CCO|BAN ON GAYS SERVING OPENLY IN
20101210020717.667|20101210020719.333|CCO|THE MILITARY.
20101210020719.333|20101210020721.000|CCO|THEY GOT 57 VOTES, BUT NEEDED
20101210020721.000|20101210020722.429|CCO|THREE MORE TO FORCE ACTION.
20101210020722.429|20101210020723.857|CCO|MOST REPUBLICANS OPPOSED REPEAL
20101210020723.857|20101210020725.286|CCO|OUTRIGHT.
20101210020725.286|20101210020726.714|CCO|THEY ALSO SAID THEY WOULD BLOCK
20101210020726.714|20101210020728.143|CCO|ACTION ON EVERYTHING UNTIL

20101210020733.500|20101210020734.750|CCO|IN LONDON AS FURIOUS PROTESTERS

20101210020737.250|20101210020738.500|CCO|THE HOUSE OF COMMONS APPROVED
20101210020738.500|20101210020739.750|CCO|THE INCREASE AS PART OF

20101210022046.714|20101210022048.143|CCO|>> Warner: THAT REPUDIATION
20101210022048.143|20101210022049.571|CCO|ERUPTED WEDNESDAY WHEN THOUSANDS
20101210022049.571|20101210022051.000|CCO|OF ANGRY HAITIANS PARALYZED
20101210022051.000|20101210022052.429|CCO|PARTS OF THE CITY.
20101210022052.429|20101210022053.857|CCO|THEY BURNED TIRES AND BUILDINGS,
20101210022053.857|20101210022055.286|CCO|INCLUDING THE RULING PARTY

20101210022056.714|20101210022058.143|CCO|WITH LOCAL POLICE AND U.N.
20101210022058.143|20101210022059.571|CCO|PEACEKEEPERS, WHO FIRED TEAR GAS

20101210022101.000|20101210022103.000|CCO|THE CROWDS CLAIMED THEIR
20101210022103.000|20101210022105.000|CCO|CANDIDATE, POPULAR SINGER MICHEL
20101210022105.000|20101210022107.000|CCO|MARTELLY, HAD BEEN CHEATED OUT

20101210023529.333|20101210023531.000|CCO|CONSTRAINT.

20101210023533.500|20101210023536.000|CCO|YOUR ARM, YOU HAVE AN IDEAL

20101210023538.500|20101210023541.000|CCO|LOOKS LIKE.
20101210023541.000|20101210023543.000|CCO|IT DOESN'T LOOK LIKE THIS, BUT
20101210023543.000|20101210023545.000|CCO|IF YOU TRY TO DO IT, AND IN YOUR
20101210023545.000|20101210023547.000|CCO|MIND'S EYE, YOU ARE FEELING IT

20101210023549.000|20101210023551.000|CCO|EXTENT THAT YOU CAN IMAGINE IT,
20101210023551.000|20101210023553.000|CCO|THEN YOU ARE THERE.
20101210023553.000|20101210023555.000|CCO|>> Reporter: AND WHEN YOU'RE
